Back in my day, we used to use really sharp pencils and write tiny on small pieces of paper. I had a physics exam which ALLOWED a 3x5 index card of "notes" for the test, and you'd be amazed what you can fit on both sides of a 3x5 if you use multiple layers of different colored inks.
